title: Dungeon Delver

n Delver: Perception Dungeon Delver: Resist Traps

Dungeon Delver: Perception Dungeon Delver: Resist Traps

How to unlock Dungeon Delver

You'll need to fulfill the following requirements to unlock Dungeon Delver

All Classes Lvl 4

Dungeon Delver Tips & Notes

You usually have one character in your party with high perception, like your Rogue or your Ranger, maybe your bard or something like that. Giving them advantage just makes things easier for you. You can use Enhance Ability (Owl's Wisdom)
